abstract: Facebook, the social-networking site, created a stir in garages all across Silicon Valley this week with the news that its backers formed an unusual $10 million fund to make grants to start-ups that want to create Facebook applications.
lead_paragraph: Facebook, the social-networking site, created a stir in garages all across Silicon Valley this week with the news that its backers formed an unusual $10 million fund to make grants to start-ups that want to create Facebook applications.
